GE07mbh_15_u:312: 15,007.008c atiduḥkhāc ca rājānaṃ nocuḥ kiṃ cana pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:313: 15,007.009a gāndhārī tv eva dharmajñā manasodvahatī bhṛśam
GE07mbh_15_u:314: 15,007.009c duḥkhāny avārayad rājan maivam ity eva cābravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:315: 15,007.010a itarās tu striyaḥ sarvāḥ kuntyā saha suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:319: 15,007.012a glāyate me manas tāta bhūyo bhūyaḥ prajalpataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:320: 15,007.012c na mām ataḥ paraṃ putra parikleṣṭum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_15_u:321: 15,007.013a tasmiṃs tu kauravendre taṃ tathā bruvati pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_15_u:323: 15,007.014a dṛṣṭvā kṛśaṃ vivarṇaṃ ca rājānam atathocitam
GE07mbh_15_u:326: 15,007.015c śokajaṃ bāṣpam utsṛjya punar vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:327: 15,007.016a na kāmaye naraśreṣṭha jīvitaṃ pṛthivīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:328: 15,007.016c yathā tava priyaṃ rājaṃś cikīrṣāmi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_15_u:329: 15,007.017a yadi tv aham anugrāhyo bhavato dayito 'pi vā
GE07mbh_15_u:330: 15,007.017c kriyatāṃ tāvad āhāras tato vetsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_15_u:332: 15,007.018c anujñātas tvayā putra bhuñjīyām iti kāmaye
GE07mbh_15_u:338: 15,008.002a ayaṃ hi vṛddho nṛpatir hataputro viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:339: 15,008.002c nedaṃ kṛcchraṃ cirataraṃ sahed iti matir mama
GE07mbh_15_u:342: 15,008.004a aham apy etad eva tvāṃ bravīmi kuru me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:343: 15,008.004c anujñāṃ labhatāṃ rājā mā vṛtheha mariṣyati
GE07mbh_15_u:344: 15,008.004d*0023_01 svastho bhavatv ayaṃ dhīmān vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE07mbh_15_u:346: 15,008.005c rājarṣīṇāṃ hi sarveṣām ante vanam upāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:348: 15,008.006a ity uktaḥ sa tadā rājā vyāsenādbhutakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_15_u:350: 15,008.007a bhagavān eva no mānyo bhagavān eva no guruḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:351: 15,008.007c bhagavān asya rājyasya kulasya ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:352: 15,008.008a ahaṃ tu putro bhagavān pitā rājā guruś ca me
GE07mbh_15_u:353: 15,008.008c nideśavartī ca pituḥ putro bhavati dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:354: 15,008.009a ity uktaḥ sa tu taṃ prāha vyāso dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:355: 15,008.009c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mahātejāḥ punar eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_15_u:356: 15,008.010a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:357: 15,008.010c rājāyaṃ vṛddhatāṃ prāptaḥ pramāṇe parame sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:359: 15,008.011c karotu svam abhiprāyaṃ māsya vighnakaro bhava
GE07mbh_15_u:360: 15,008.012a eṣa eva paro dharmo rājarṣīṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_15_u:361: 15,008.012c samare vā bhaven mṛtyur vane vā vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_15_u:362: 15,008.013a pitrā tu tava rājendra pāṇḍunā pṛthivīkṣitā
GE07mbh_15_u:365: 15,008.014c mahadbhir iṣṭaṃ bhogāś ca bhuktāḥ putrāś ca pālitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:366: 15,008.015a putrasaṃsthaṃ ca vipulaṃ rājyaṃ viproṣite tvayi
GE07mbh_15_u:367: 15,008.015c trayodaśasamā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ ca vividhaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_15_u:371: 15,008.017c na manyur vidyate cāsya susūkṣmo 'pi yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_15_u:372: 15,008.018a etāvad uktvā vacanam anujñāpya ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_15_u:373: 15,008.018c tathāstv iti ca tenoktaḥ kaunteyena yayau vanam
GE07mbh_15_u:374: 15,008.019a gate bhagavati vyāse rājā pāṇḍusutas tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:375: 15,008.019c provāca pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ mandaṃ mandam ivānataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:376: 15,008.020a yad āha bhagavān vyāso yac cāpi bhavato matam
GE07mbh_15_u:377: 15,008.020c yad āha ca maheṣvāsaḥ kṛpo vidura eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:378: 15,008.021a yuyutsuḥ saṃjayaś caiva tat kartāsmy aham añjasā
GE07mbh_15_u:379: 15,008.021c sarve hy ete 'numānyā me kulasyāsya hitaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:380: 15,008.022a idaṃ tu yāce nṛpate tvām ahaṃ śirasā nataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:381: 15,008.022c kriyatāṃ tāvad āhāras tato gacchāśramaṃ prati
GE07mbh_15_u:386: 15,009.002c padātiḥ sa mahīpālo jīrṇo gajapatir yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:387: 15,009.003a tam anvagacchad viduro vidvān sūtaś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:388: 15,009.003c sa cāpi parameṣvāsaḥ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:391: 15,009.005a gāndhārī caiva dharmajñā kuntyā saha manasvinī
GE07mbh_15_u:394: 15,009.006c pāṇḍavāś ca kuruśreṣṭham upātiṣṭhanta taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_15_u:399: 15,009.009a tat tu śakyaṃ yathā tāta rakṣituṃ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_15_u:400: 15,009.009c rājyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kaunteya vidvān asi nibodha tat
GE07mbh_15_u:402: 15,009.010c śṛṇuyās te ca yad brūyuḥ kuryāś caivāvicārayan
GE07mbh_15_u:403: 15,009.011a prātar utthāya tān rājan pūjayitvā yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_15_u:405: 15,009.012a te tu saṃmānitā rājaṃs tvayā rājyahitārthinā
GE07mbh_15_u:408: 15,009.013c hitāya vai bhaviṣyanti rakṣitaṃ draviṇaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_15_u:410: 15,009.014c dāntān karmasu sarveṣu mukhyān mukhyeṣu yojayeḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:411: 15,009.015a cārayethāś ca satataṃ cārair aviditaiḥ parān
GE07mbh_15_u:413: 15,009.016a puraṃ ca te suguptaṃ syād dṛḍhaprākāratoraṇam
GE07mbh_15_u:415: 15,009.017a tasya dvārāṇi kāryāṇi paryāptāni bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_15_u:418: 15,009.018c ātmā ca rakṣyaḥ satataṃ bhojanādiṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:420: 15,009.019c striyaś ca te suguptāḥ syur vṛddhair āptair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:421: 15,009.019e śīlavadbhiḥ kulīnaiś ca vidvadbhiś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_15_u:423: 15,009.020c vinītāṃś ca kulīnāṃś ca dharmārthakuśalān ṛjūn
GE07mbh_15_u:424: 15,009.021a taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayethās tvaṃ nātyarthaṃ bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_15_u:425: 15,009.021c samastair api ca vyastair vyapadeśena kena cit
GE07mbh_15_u:427: 15,009.022c araṇye niḥśalāke vā na ca rātrau kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_15_u:429: 15,009.023c sarve mantragṛhe varjyā ye cāpi jaḍapaṅgukāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:430: 15,009.024a mantrabhede hi ye doṣā bhavanti pṛthivīkṣitām
GE07mbh_15_u:431: 15,009.024c na te śakyāḥ samādhātuṃ kathaṃ cid iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:432: 15,009.025a doṣāṃś ca mantrabhedeṣu brūyās tvaṃ mantrimaṇḍale
GE07mbh_15_u:433: 15,009.025c abhede ca guṇān rājan punaḥ punar ariṃdama
GE07mbh_15_u:435: 15,009.026c yathā syād viditaṃ rājaṃs tathā kāryam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_15_u:437: 15,010.001a vyavahārāś ca te tāta nityam āptair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:438: 15,010.001c yojyās tuṣṭair hitai rājan nityaṃ cārair anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:439: 15,010.001d*0024_01 alubdhaiś cāsya vyasanibhiḥ snigdhair ātmasamaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:440: 15,010.002a parimāṇaṃ viditvā ca daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:444: 15,010.004a ākroṣṭāraś ca lubdhāś ca hantāraḥ sāhasapriyāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:447: 15,010.004f*0025_01 avarodhabhūmau bhṛtyais tu saha pānaṃ vivarjayet
GE07mbh_15_u:448: 15,010.004f*0025_02 ākrośanty anumattās te kalatraṃ cāpi gṛhṇate
GE07mbh_15_u:449: 15,010.004f*0025_03 jighāṃsanty api śastreṇa naṣṭāḥ krīḍanti cotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:453: 15,010.004f*0025_07 buddhvemān pānadoṣāṃs tu pibed ekaḥ svajāyayā
GE07mbh_15_u:455: 15,010.005a prātar eva hi paśyethā ye kuryur vyayakarma te
GE07mbh_15_u:456: 15,010.005c alaṃkāram atho bhojyam ata ūrdhvaṃ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:457: 15,010.006a paśyethāś ca tato yodhān sadā tvaṃ pariharṣayan
GE07mbh_15_u:458: 15,010.006c dūtānāṃ ca carāṇāṃ ca pradoṣas te sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_15_u:460: 15,010.007c madhyarātre vihāras te madhyāhne ca sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_15_u:461: 15,010.008a sarve tv ātyayikāḥ kālāḥ kāryāṇāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_15_u:465: 15,010.008e cakravat karmaṇāṃ tāta paryāyo hy eṣa nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:466: 15,010.009a kośasya saṃcaye yatnaṃ kurvīthā nyāyataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:468: 15,010.010a cārair viditvā śatrūṃś ca ye te rājyāntarāyiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:469: 15,010.010c tān āptaiḥ puruṣair dūrād ghātayethāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_15_u:472: 15,010.012a senāpraṇetā ca bhavet tava tāta dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:473: 15,010.012c śūraḥ kleśasahaś caiva priyaś ca tava mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:474: 15,010.013a sarve jānapadāś caiva tava karmāṇi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_15_u:475: 15,010.013c paurogavāś ca sabhyāś ca kuryur ye vyavahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:476: 15,010.014a svarandhraṃ pararandhraṃ ca sveṣu caiva pareṣu ca
GE07mbh_15_u:480: 15,010.016a guṇārthināṃ guṇaḥ kāryo viduṣāṃ te janādhipa
GE07mbh_15_u:481: 15,010.016c avicālyāś ca te te syur yathā merur mahāgiriḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:483: 15,011.001a maṇḍalāni ca budhyethāḥ pareṣām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:488: 15,011.003c balāni ca kuruśreṣṭha bhavanty eṣāṃ yathecchakam
GE07mbh_15_u:489: 15,011.004a te ca dvādaśa kaunteya rājñāṃ vai vividhātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:490: 15,011.004c mantripradhānāś ca guṇāḥ ṣaṣṭir dvādaśa ca prabho
GE07mbh_15_u:491: 15,011.005a etan maṇḍalam ity āhur ācāryā nītikovidāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:492: 15,011.005c atra ṣāḍguṇyam āyattaṃ yudhiṣṭhira nibodha tat
GE07mbh_15_u:493: 15,011.006a vṛddhikṣayau ca vijñeyau sthānaṃ ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_15_u:496: 15,011.007c vigṛhya śatrūn kaunteya yāyāt kṣitipatis tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:500: 15,011.008a dravyāṇāṃ saṃcayaś caiva kartavyaḥ syān mahāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:502: 15,011.009a tadā sarvaṃ vidheyaṃ syāt sthānaṃ ca na vibhājayet
GE07mbh_15_u:507: 15,011.011c viparītas tu te 'deyaḥ putra kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_15_u:508: 15,011.011e tasya pramokṣe yatnaṃ ca kuryāḥ sopāyamantravit
GE07mbh_15_u:509: 15,011.012a prakṛtīnāṃ ca kaunteya rājā dīnāṃ vibhāvayet
GE07mbh_15_u:511: 15,011.013a pīḍanaṃ stambhanaṃ caiva kośabhaṅgas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:512: 15,011.013c kāryaṃ yatnena śatrūṇāṃ svarāṣṭraṃ rakṣatā svayam
GE07mbh_15_u:513: 15,011.014a na ca hiṃsyo 'bhyupagataḥ sāmanto vṛddhim icchatā
GE07mbh_15_u:514: 15,011.014c kaunteya taṃ na hiṃseta yo mahīṃ vijigīṣate
GE07mbh_15_u:515: 15,011.015a gaṇānāṃ bhedane yogaṃ gacchethāḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:519: 15,011.017a yady evam abhiyāyāc ca durbalaṃ balavān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:521: 15,011.018a aśaknuvaṃs tu yuddhāya niṣpatet saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:522: 15,011.018c kośena paurair daṇḍena ye cānye priyakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:524: 15,011.019c krameṇānena mokṣaḥ syāc charīram api kevalam
GE07mbh_15_u:529: 15,012.002c tuṣṭapuṣṭabalaḥ śatrur ātmavān iti ca smaret
GE07mbh_15_u:532: 15,012.004a vyasanaṃ bhedanaṃ caiva śatrūṇāṃ kārayet tataḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:533: 15,012.004c karśanaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ caiva yuddhe cāpi bahukṣayam
GE07mbh_15_u:535: 15,012.005c ātmanaś caiva śatroś ca śaktiṃ śāstraviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:538: 15,012.007a ādadīta balaṃ rājā maulaṃ mitrabalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:539: 15,012.007c aṭavībalaṃ bhṛtaṃ caiva tathā śreṇībalaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_15_u:540: 15,012.008a tatra mitrabalaṃ rājan maulena na viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_15_u:541: 15,012.008c śreṇībalaṃ bhṛtaṃ caiva tulya eveti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:545: 15,012.010c bhavanti rājñāṃ kauravya yās tāḥ pṛthag ataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_15_u:547: 15,012.011c sāmādibhir upanyasya śamayet tān nṛpaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_15_u:548: 15,012.012a yātrāṃ yāyād balair yukto rājā ṣaḍbhiḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_15_u:551: 15,012.013c āhūtaś cāpy atho yāyād anṛtāv api pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:556: 15,012.015a athopapattyā śakaṭaṃ padmaṃ vajraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:557: 15,012.015c uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ tatraitad vihitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_15_u:559: 15,012.016c svabhūmau yojayed yuddhaṃ parabhūmau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:560: 15,012.017a labdhaṃ praśamayed rājā nikṣiped dhanino narān
GE07mbh_15_u:561: 15,012.017c jñātvā svaviṣayaṃ taṃ ca sāmādibhir upakramet
GE07mbh_15_u:564: 15,012.019a evaṃ kurvañ śubhā vāco loke 'smiñ śṛṇute nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:565: 15,012.019c pretya svargaṃ tathāpnoti prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_15_u:567: 15,012.020c ubhayor lokayos tāta prāptaye nityam eva ca
GE07mbh_15_u:568: 15,012.021a bhīṣmeṇa pūrvam ukto 'si kṛṣṇena vidureṇa ca
GE07mbh_15_u:569: 15,012.021c mayāpy avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ prītyā te nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_15_u:571: 15,012.022c priyas tathā prajānāṃ tvaṃ svarge sukham avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_15_u:573: 15,012.023c pālayed vāpi dharmeṇa prajās tulyaṃ phalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_15_u:577: 15,013.002a bhīṣme svargam anuprāpte gate ca madhusūdane
GE07mbh_15_u:578: 15,013.002c vidure saṃjaye caiva ko 'nyo māṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_15_u:579: 15,013.003a yat tu mām anuśāstīha bhavān adya hite sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:580: 15,013.003c kartāsmy etan mahīpāla nirvṛto bhava bhārata
GE07mbh_15_u:582: 15,013.004a evam uktaḥ sa rājarṣir dharmarājena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_15_u:584: 15,013.005a putra viśramyatāṃ tāvan mamāpi balavāñ śramaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:585: 15,013.005c ity uktvā prāviśad rājā gāndhāryā bhavanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:591: 15,013.008a gāndhāry aham anujñātaḥ svayaṃ pitrā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_15_u:593: 15,013.009a ahaṃ hi nāma sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ durdyūtadevinām
GE07mbh_15_u:596: 15,013.009f*0028_01 dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sa tān sarvān pretakāryārtham abravīt
GE07mbh_15_u:599: 15,013.010a ity uktvā dharmarājāya preṣayām āsa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:600: 15,013.010c sa ca tadvacanāt sarvaṃ samāninye mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:601: 15,013.011a tato niṣkramya nṛpatis tasmād antaḥpurāt tadā
GE07mbh_15_u:602: 15,013.011c sarvaṃ suhṛjjanaṃ caiva sarvāś ca prakṛtīs tathā
GE07mbh_15_u:603: 15,013.011e samavetāṃś ca tān sarvān paurajānapadān atha
GE07mbh_15_u:604: 15,013.011f*0030_01 tān āgatān abhiprekṣya samastaṃ ca suhṛjjanam
GE07mbh_15_u:608: 15,013.013c kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:611: 15,013.015a yad idānīm ahaṃ brūyām asmin kāla upasthite
GE07mbh_15_u:612: 15,013.015c tathā bhavadbhiḥ kartavyam avicārya vaco mama
GE07mbh_15_u:615: 15,013.016e bhavanto 'py anujānantu mā vo 'nyā bhūd vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_15_u:616: 15,013.017a asmākaṃ bhavatāṃ caiva yeyaṃ prītir hi śāśvatī
GE07mbh_15_u:617: 15,013.017c na cānyeṣv asti deśeṣu rājñām iti matir mama
GE07mbh_15_u:620: 15,013.019a yudhiṣṭhiragate rājye prāptaś cāsmi sukhaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_15_u:622: 15,013.020a mama tv andhasya vṛddhasya hataputrasya kā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_15_u:623: 15,013.020c ṛte vanaṃ mahābhāgās tan mānujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_15_u:624: 15,013.021a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarve te kurujāṅgalāḥ
